hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EORH.EORH_ID,EORH.EORH_EODE_ID,EORH.EORH_WORK_ORDER_NO,EORH.EORH_ORDER_NO,EORH.EORH_RETURN_OPERATOR,EORH.EORH_RETURN_TIME,EORH.ORG_ID,EORH.CREATOR,EORH.CREATE_TIME,EORH.MODIFIER,EORH.MODIFY_TIME,EORH.REC_VER,EORH.REC_STATUS FROM EO_DELIVERY_RECEIPT_HIS EORH WHERE EORH.EORH_EODE_ID IN (:eorhEodeId) ORDER BY EORH.MODIFY_TIME
